title: Shepherd's Pie
tagline: Savory meat filling topped with mashed potatoes
steps: Boil potatoes until tender. Mash with 4 tbsp butter and cream. Season.
Brown beef, breaking into pieces. Drain, transfer out.
Cook vegetables in remaining butter until soft, 8 minutes.
Add garlic and tomato paste, cook 1 minute.
Return beef. Add broth, peas, Worcestershire, thyme. Simmer 10 minutes. Season.
Spread mashed potatoes over filling. Rough up surface with fork.
notes: 'Shepherd's pie' uses lamb; 'cottage pie' uses beef.
Roughing up potatoes creates crispy peaks.
